channel.title: Comments on: Jewish -Islamic Encounter: Death of Sheikh Bukhari and rise of US encounter
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Solihin
item.dc:creator: Solihin
item.description: we had a very fruitful and enjoyable encounter whilst in Edinburgh for the MESC. We were touched and honoured to meet this great man for several days, and pray that the Great Life will take his soul where it needs to go. May Peace be on his family and friends.
item.content:encoded: we had a very fruitful and enjoyable encounter whilst in Edinburgh for the MESC. We were touched and honoured to meet this great man for several days, and pray that the Great Life will take his soul where it needs to go. May Peace be on his family and friends.
